name: Adventurers Offline
description:
NOTE: 

  1. (The HTML version is rather laggy- if your device can launch .exe files, it is recommended that you download the offline .zip version)
  2. If you play the .html version of this game, you must have cookies enabled.
  3. Please allow all pop-ups for this page. If you reach the end of the game and a pop-up gets blocked, please refresh the game and try again.
